name: Shoprite Checkers (Pty) Ltd
headAddress: Cnr William Dabbs Street and Old Paarl Roads
goal: The Shoprite Group delivers low prices in a world-class shopping environment to our customers across the African continent.
euInitiatives: In the context of the EU-SA "Dialogue on Government and Industry Food Waste Reduction, Prevention and Awareness Initiative: Developing and committing to a voluntary agreement to prevent and reduce food waste through sustainable food systems and influence policy dialogue and change Project"
